entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 10:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High 6.
